0.name: [Pippi]
0.text: Thanks for freeing me from that coffin, Ninten.

1.name: [Pippi]
1.text: I was scared I was going to be eaten by zombies or starve to death.

2.name: [Pippi]
2.text: You say the mayor's looking for me, right?

3.name: [Pippi]
3.text: Well maybe we don't have to see that old guy just yet.

4.name: [Pippi]
4.text: I really want to go see that pet shop in the department store.

5.name: [Pippi]
5.text: It's practically like a zoo, but you don't even have to PAY to see the animals.
